event.name: Look

actor.doc: The character that performed the look.

event.doc: Invoked whenever a character looks around in a room, or at a specific entity in a room.

event.name: LeaveRoom

aux.doc: The portal being used, if any.

event.doc: Whenever a creature leaves the room.

event.name: EnterRoom

aux.doc: The portal being entered from, if any.

event.doc: Whenever a creature enters the room.

event.name: LeaveZone
event.doc: Whenever a creature leaves the zone.

event.name: EnterZone
event.doc: Whenever a creature enters the zone.

event.name: TouchItem
event.doc: Whenever a creature attempts any action which requires touching the target item.

event.name: GraspItem
event.doc: Whenever a creature attempts any action which requires holding the target item, even if only for a moment.

event.name: ReleaseItem
event.doc: Whenever a creature attempts any action that requires releasing a held item permanently. This should NOT be called when an item is held only temporarily for the duration of the action. It should be called if the item is being moved from the hands to another body location or carried container.

event.name: GetItem

arg.doc: The type of container being used (in, on).

event.doc: Whenever a creature retrieves an item from a container.

event.name: PutItem

arg.doc: The type of container being used (in, on).

event.doc: Whenever a creature puts an item into a container.

event.name: DropItem
event.doc: Whenever a creature drops an item to the floor of the room.

event.name: PickupItem

actor.doc: The creature picking up the item.

event.doc: Whenever a creature picks up an item from the floor of a room.
